about.title: About Me
about.description: Hailing from Lagos Nigeria, my name is Oyinkan [o-yi(n)-co(n)] Ifidon-Ola. Currently double majoring in Design and Information Analysis, my driving force is understanding people, having empathy towards the challenges they are presented with, and helping them find solutions through intuitive design and insightful interaction. I hope to create culturally impactful work that improves the world we live in.
